summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of 1777, for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, from Washington Street to Yesler Way, by grading the same, constructing wooden gutters and crosswalks, and concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 18676, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
